prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon that embodies both psychic abilities and playful energy.
I want a small, pink Pokemon with large ears and an agile body for my collection.
Generate a Pokemon with a mysterious aura and cute features, perfect for a fantasy setting.
Make a legendary creature that can float and has a whimsical look with pastel colors.
Imagine a cute, psychic-type Pokemon that can teleport and has a charming personality.
Design a small, playful Pokemon that loves to explore forests and mountains.
Give me a unique Pokemon that can blend into its surroundings with soft, pink fur.

distinctive_features: Long tail with a curled end
